meaningMnemonic: Turn a <radical>sick</radical>ness into a <radical>weapon</radical> and it becomes an <kanji>epidemic</kanji>. This sickness spreads to everyone and it's all your fault because you put it in the water supply.
readingMnemonic: These <kanji>epidemic</kanji>s spread by <reading>駅</reading> (えき). Each train takes the sickness and shoots off in a different direction, spreading it further.
